name: Savegame-manager-gx Nintendo Mii
summary: A MIIGX file is a Nintendo Mii saved in a format used by savegame-manager-gx, a custom game save and Mii manager for the Nintendo Wii. MIIGX files contain a Mii extracted from a Nintendo Wii or a custom Mii created using a PC-based Mii modding program, such as My Avatar Editor.
